full_summary:
### IBM Spectrum Scale Data Access Edition Tender Announcement
#### SSC-23-00023193:T Amendment/Specification  1

 On July 5, 2023, Shared Services Canada (SSC) announced a request for proposal process for IBM Spectrum Scale Data Access Edition per terabyte or equivalent (SSC SS CMND MJJ-132-00113909). This announcement is for the procurement of IBM Spectrum Scale Data Access Edition services.

### Tender Information

#### Bidder Requirements
IBM Spectrum Scale Data Access Edition per terabyte or equivalent contract will be awarded based on a competitive open-bidding process following the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

#### Tender Details
- **Reference Number**: SSC-23-00023193:T
- **Solicitation Number**: BPM019107/23193
- **Publication Date**: July 5, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: July 18, 2023 (2:00 PM EST)
- **Assistance Region**: Quebec (expecting Nationally Capital Region)
- **Trade Agreements Applicable**: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- **Contracting Entity (Buyer)**: Shared Services Canada (SSC)

### Important Dates
- July 18, 2023 (2:00 PM EST): Tender Closing Date
- For details on How-to Bid, please consult the contract documents.

### Additional Documents and Resources
The contract documents can be downloaded from the Shared Services Canada website. Please click [here](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/BC8AFAB4-834E-41DE-85D7-2EA3472AD301) and [here](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/8185E1B6-AFF7-4BEA-8E48-E845781E2142).

For questions and further information, please contact:

- Name: Mr. Raiyane Bendkroun
- Email: [raiyanb@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:raiyanb@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
- Phone: (613)
